## jx start

Starts a process such as a pipeline

### Synopsis


Starts a process such as a Jenkins pipeline.

```
jx start TYPE [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Start a pipeline
  jx start pipeline foo
```

* [jx](jx.md)	 - jx is a command line tool for working with Jenkins X
